thread.title: Hot Wheels® takes over New York City with a fleet of Star Wars™ First Order Stormtrooper™ vehicles to celebrate Force Friday
thread.title_full: Hot Wheels® takes over New York City with a fleet of Star Wars™ First Order Stormtrooper™ vehicles to celebrate Force Friday - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Hot Wheels® takes over New York City with a fleet of Star Wars™ First Order Stormtrooper™ vehicles to celebrate Force Friday
text:
Mattel, Inc.
NEW YORK , Sept. 4, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Today, Hot Wheels is offering Uber riders and fans in New York City the chance to catch a free ride in a Star Wars First Order Stormtrooper Dodge Charger uniquely modeled after the Hot Wheels 1:64 character car, available at retailers nationwide. For more information, visit www.hotwheels.com
(NASDAQ: MAT)
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150904/263754
Logo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150630/226835LOGO
